Unresolved & Undetected Galaxies in GALFA
Last 4 added from resolved category, considered too small since radius close to 2 arcmin
These are all the galaxies that have velocity values in the galfa_unresolved_undetected table, this is the range of the standard deviations found at each velocity channel at the location of the galaxy in +/- 5 channels from the central velocity channel. They are all set to equal a 30arcmin diameter area.
Code: Unresolved Undetected
